A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Surprising that a film this long could have so many plot holes and pointless sub-stories. From weak attempts at emotional draw to outright slapstick moments\, this movie holds no concern for the overall Star Wars story line\, and yet offers nothing grappling in turning in a new direction. It's clear the focus was on creating campy characters and creatures to be plush dolls lining the shelves of Disney stores nationwide. If you're able to stomach the eye-rolling moments\, you'll come out thinking \"What was that even about?\"
